# 2018 July 25 (fixed)

## Armed conflicts and attacks

*   [Syrian Civil War](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Syrian_Civil_War)
    *   [2018 As-Suwayda attacks](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2018_As-Suwayda_attacks)
        *   Coordinated suicide bombings and shootings carried out by the [Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Islamic_State_of_Iraq_and_the_Levant) in [As-Suwayda](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/As-Suwayda), [Syria](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Syria), kill 215 people and injure more than 200 others. [(Reuters)](https://www.reuters.com/article/us-mideast-crisis-syria-attack/islamic-state-kills-dozens-in-south-syria-attacks-state-media-idUSKBN1KF0DG)

## Business and economy

*   [United States–European Union relations](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/United_States%E2%80%93European_Union_relations), [Trump tariffs](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Trump_tariffs)
    *   [U.S. President](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/President_of_the_United_States) [Donald Trump](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Donald_Trump) and European leaders agree to halt their trade war over vehicles and say they will open talks on removing trade barriers between the [United States](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/United_States) and the [European Union](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/European_Union). [(AP via _Yahoo! Finance_)](https://finance.yahoo.com/news/gop-lawmakers-critical-relief-program-farmers-052430924--finance.html)

## Disasters and accidents

*   [2018 Attica wildfires](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2018_Attica_wildfires)
    *   The death toll from the wildfires in [Greece](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Greece) rises to 80 people while many others are still missing. [(BBC)](https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-europe-44948173)
*   [2018 Laos dam collapse](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2018_Laos_dam_collapse)
    *   The death toll from a dam collapse in [Laos](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Laos) that caused heavy floods rises to 26, while more than 130 remain missing. [(Channel NewsAsia)](https://www.channelnewsasia.com/news/asia/laos-dam-disaster-17-bodies-flood-10561186)
*   A [Legionella](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Legionella) outbreak in [Bresso](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bresso), [Italy](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Italy), kills three people while 17 others are hospitalized. [(Corriere Della Sera)](https://milano.corriere.it/notizie/cronaca/18_luglio_25/bresso-salgono-17-casi-legionella-un-altra-anziana-morta-fe2bc5ec-8f7c-11e8-84b6-8543850c3d94.shtml)

## Law and crime

*   [2018 Quetta suicide bombing](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2018_Quetta_suicide_bombing)
    *   A blast outside a [polling station](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Polling_place) in [Quetta](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quetta), [Pakistan](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pakistan), kills 31 people and wounds several more on election day. [(_Hindustan Times_)](https://www.hindustantimes.com/world-news/pakistan-elections-23-killed-in-blast-in-quetta-say-reports/story-tD55pRKM9ww0ITdDOTh4oK.html)

## Politics and elections

*   [Pakistani general election, 2018](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pakistani_general_election,_2018)
    *   Voters in [Pakistan](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pakistan) go to the polls to elect the members of the [National Assembly](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/National_Assembly_of_Pakistan) and the four Provincial Assemblies of Pakistan. [(Reuters)](https://www.reuters.com/article/us-pakistan-election-election/voting-begins-in-pakistans-general-election-idUSKBN1KF08C)

## Science and technology

*   [Water on Mars](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Water_on_Mars)
    *   Scientists at [INAF](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/INAF) announce the discovery of a liquid water lake beneath a [polar ice cap](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Martian_polar_ice_caps) on [Mars](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mars). The discovery was made using [MARSIS](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/MARSIS), a radar instrument on board the [European Space Agency](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/European_Space_Agency)'s _[Mars Express](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mars_Express)_ orbiter. [(BBC)](https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/science-environment-44952710)

---

https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Portal:Current_events/2018_July_25

# 2018 July 26

## Business and economy

*   [Facebook](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Facebook) stocks drop 20% ([US$](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/US$)118 billion), setting a record as the biggest single stock market loss in one day, and marking the first time that a stock lost over $100 billion in one day. [(CNBC)](https://www.cnbc.com/2018/07/26/facebook-on-pace-for-biggest-one-day-loss-in-value-for-any-company-sin.html)

## International relations

*   [European migrant crisis](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/European_migrant_crisis)
    *   Hundreds of [Sub-Saharan African](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sub-Saharan_Africa) migrants storm a border fence in [Spain](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Spain)'s [North African](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/North_Africa) enclave of [Ceuta](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ceuta), using home-made flamethrowers and other improvised weapons. The [Spanish Civil Guard](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Civil_Guard_(Spain)) reports that 602 people succeeded in reaching Ceuta, of whom 586 were taken to a temporary reception centre, while 16 others are being treated in a hospital. Fifteen border guards were also hurt. [(_The Guardian_)](https://www.theguardian.com/world/2018/jul/26/hundreds-storm-border-fence-spanish-enclave-north-africa-ceuta-spain-migration)

## Law and crime

*   [Capital punishment in Japan](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Capital_punishment_in_Japan)
    *   The six remaining cult members of [Aum Shinrikyo](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Aum_Shinrikyo) who perpetrated the 1995 [Tokyo subway sarin attack](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tokyo_subway_sarin_attack) and were on death row are executed by hanging. [(Japan Today)](https://japantoday.com/category/crime/Japan-hangs-all-6-remaining-AUM-death-row-inmates)
*   [Cannabis in the United Kingdom](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cannabis_in_the_United_Kingdom)
    *   The [UK](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/UK) [Home Secretary](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Home_Secretary) [Sajid Javid](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sajid_Javid) announces that [medicinal cannabis](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Medical_cannabis) products are to be legalized by the end of 2018, allowing cannabis treatments to be legally prescribed by specialist doctors following several high profile cases. [(BBC)](https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/health-44968386) [(Reuters)](https://www.reuters.com/article/us-britain-cannabis/britain-to-legalize-medicinal-use-of-cannabis-idUSKBN1KG29E)
*   A bomb explodes outside the [U.S. Embassy in China](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Embassy_of_the_United_States,_Beijing), wounding the lone assailant. [(Reuters)](https://www.reuters.com/article/us-china-blast/suspected-self-immolation-near-u-s-embassy-in-china-state-media-idUSKBN1KG0KP)

## Science and technology

*   [2018 in science](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2018_in_science)
    *   A team of [Russian](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Russians) scientists in collaboration with [Princeton University](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Princeton_University) announce in a new report that they have brought two female [nematodes](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nematodes) frozen in [permafrost](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Permafrost) from around [42,000 years](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pleistocene) ago back to life. The two nematodes are now the oldest confirmed living animals on the planet. [(_The Siberian Times_)](http://siberiantimes.com/science/casestudy/news/worms-frozen-in-permafrost-for-up-to-42000-years-come-back-to-life/)
*   Astronomers say they have observed [Albert Einstein](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Albert_Einstein)'s theory of [gravitational redshift](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gravitational_redshift) for the first time while observing a star known as [S2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/S2_(star)) interact with a [supermassive black hole](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Supermassive_black_hole) using the [Very Large Telescope](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Very_Large_Telescope) (VLT). [(BBC)](https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/science-environment-44967491)

---

https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Portal:Current_events/2018_July_26

# 2018-07-27

## Disasters and accidents

*   [2018 California wildfires](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2018_California_wildfires)
    *   The [Carr wildfire](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Carr_Fire) threatening [Redding](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Redding,_California), [California](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/California), U.S., kills two firefighters, as many residents flee their homes. [(_New York Times_)](https://www.nytimes.com/2018/07/27/us/california-wildfire-redding-carr.html)

## International relations

*   [North Korea–United States relations](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/North_Korea%E2%80%93United_States_relations)
    *   [North Korea](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/North_Korea) returns what it says are the remains of 55 U.S. servicemen killed during the [Korean War](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Korean_War) on the 65th anniversary of the signing of the [Korean Armistice Agreement](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Korean_Armistice_Agreement). The repatriation was agreed at the [June summit](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2018_North_Korea%E2%80%93United_States_summit) between [U.S. President](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/U.S._President) [Donald Trump](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Donald_Trump) and [North Korean](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/North_Korea) leader [Kim Jong-un](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kim_Jong-un) in a bid to improve relations. [(Sky News)](https://news.sky.com/story/north-korea-returns-the-remains-of-us-war-dead-11450781) [(Vox)](https://www.vox.com/2018/7/27/17621448/north-korea-trump-remains-55-war)

## Science and technology

*   [July 2018 lunar eclipse](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/July_2018_lunar_eclipse)
    *   The longest total [lunar eclipse](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lunar_eclipse) of the 21st century colours the moon reddish orange in parts of Africa, Asia and Europe for about one hour and 42 minutes. [(ABC News)](https://abcnews.go.com/amp/International/longest-total-lunar-eclipse-21st-century-has-begun/story?id=56718699)

## Business and economy

*   [Proposed acquisition of 21st Century Fox by Disney](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proposed_acquisition_of_21st_Century_Fox_by_Disney)
    *   [21st Century Fox](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/21st_Century_Fox) share holders approve a $71.3 billion merger with [The Walt Disney Company](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Walt_Disney_Company). [(Variety)](https://variety.com/2018/biz/news/21st-century-fox-disney-merger-shareholder-vote-1202888023/)

---

https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Portal:Current_events/2018_July_27

# 2018-07-28

## Arts and culture

*   Groundbreaking on the [Barack Obama Presidential Center](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Barack_Obama_Presidential_Center) in [Jackson Park](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jackson_Park_(Chicago)), [Illinois](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Illinois), is pushed back again until all federal approvals are completed, which will not be until 2019. [(_Chicago Sun Times_)](https://chicago.suntimes.com/news/obama-center-groundbreaking-delayed-presidential-foundation/)

## Disasters and accidents

*   [2018 Lombok earthquake](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2018_Lombok_earthquake)
    *   A magnitude 6.4 [earthquake](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Earthquake) hits [Lombok](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lombok), [Indonesia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Indonesia), destroying several houses. At least 16 people are killed and 160 others are injured. [(BBC)](https://www.bbc.com/news/world-asia-45002249)
*   Heavy monsoon rains in northern [India](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/India) leave 58 people dead. [(ABC)](http://www.abc.net.au/news/2018-07-28/india-monsoon-rains-kill-37-with-floods-and-collapsed-buildings/10047296)
*   A bus crashes in [Dapoli](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dapoli), [India](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/India), killing thirty people and leaving one sole survivor. [(Bendigo Advertiser)](https://www.bendigoadvertiser.com.au/story/5553701/all-bodies-from-india-bus-crash-recovered/?cs=5)

## Law and crime

*   Former [Armenian](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Armenia) [President](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/President_of_Armenia) [Robert Kocharyan](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_Kocharyan) is arrested and taken into police custody on charges of being involved in the [crackdown on protests in 2008](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2008_Armenian_presidential_election_protests) that resulted in ten deaths following a disputed presidential election. [(RFE/RL)](https://www.rferl.org/a/armenia-s-ex-president-kocharian-taken-into-custody-over-2008-crackdown/29394682.html)
*   A court in [Egypt](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Egypt) sentences 75 supporters of former [president](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/President_of_Egypt) [Mohammed Morsi](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mohammed_Morsi) to death, as part of a trial of more than 700. [(BBC)](https://www.bbc.com/news/world-middle-east-44993661)

## Politics and elections

*   [Australian federal by-elections](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Australian_federal_by-elections)
    *   Five separate [by-elections](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/By-election) are held for five seats in the [Australian House of Representatives](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Australian_House_of_Representatives), namely [Braddon](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Braddon_by-election,_2018), [Fremantle](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fremantle_by-election,_2018), [Longman](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Longman_by-election,_2018), [Mayo](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mayo_by-election,_2018) and [Perth](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Perth_by-election,_2018), four of which were triggered by the [dual citizenship crisis](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2017%E2%80%9318_Australian_parliamentary_eligibility_crisis). [(_The Guardian_)](https://www.theguardian.com/australia-news/2018/jul/28/tasmanian-voters-face-last-minute-blitz-by-party-leaders-on-super-saturday)
*   [Basic Law: Israel as the Nation-State of the Jewish People](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Basic_Law:_Israel_as_the_Nation-State_of_the_Jewish_People)
    *   [Israeli](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Israel) Arab MP [Zouheir Bahloul](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Zouheir_Bahloul) resigns over the "nation-state" law. [(BBC)](https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-middle-east-44995501)

---

https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Portal:Current_events/2018_July_28

# 2018-07-29

## Disasters and accidents

*   [2018 Pacific typhoon season](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2018_Pacific_typhoon_season)
    *   [Typhoon Jongdari](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Typhoon_Jongdari) hits central and western [Japan](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Japan), injuring at least 21 people and cutting power to tens of thousands of homes. The typhoon is the latest in the series of weather events to affect the country, following devastating [floods](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2018_Japan_floods) and a fatal [heat wave](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2018_Japan_heat_wave) earlier in the month. [(BBC)](https://www.bbc.com/news/world-asia-44990966)
*   [2018 Attica wildfires](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2018_Attica_wildfires)
    *   The death toll from the fires in [Greece](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Greece) rises to 91 while 25 other people are still missing. [(AP)](http://www.tampabay.com/the-latest-greece-fire-death-toll-at---remain-missing-ap_world9ecd925e64a94265bde034a70ace173a)
*   [List of people who disappeared mysteriously](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_people_who_disappeared_mysteriously)
    *   TeNiya Elnora Jones, a [University of Kentucky](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/University_of_Kentucky) student studying abroad in the [Middle East](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Middle_East), is reported missing after a swimming accident over the weekend in [Tel Aviv](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tel_Aviv), [Israel](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Israel). [(USA Today)](https://www.usatoday.com/story/news/nation-now/2018/07/29/fort-myers-college-student-missing-israel-beach/860689002/)

## International relations

*   [Israeli–Palestinian conflict](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Israeli%E2%80%93Palestinian_conflict), [2018 Gaza border protests](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2018_Gaza_border_protests)
    *   [Palestinian](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Palestinians) teenager [Ahed Tamimi](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ahed_Tamimi) is released from an [Israeli](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Israel) prison. [(NBC News)](https://www.nbcnews.com/news/world/palestinian-protest-icon-tamimi-released-israeli-prison-jubilant-scenes-n895566)

## Law and crime

*   Four cyclists, two [Americans](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Americans), one [Dutch](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dutch_people) national and one [Swiss](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Swiss_people) national, are killed in the [Khatlon Region](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Khatlon_Region), [Tajikistan](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tajikistan) by a hit-and-run driver while three others are injured. A 21 year old male suspect has been arrested. # 2018-08-05

## Armed conflicts and attacks

*   [War in Afghanistan (2001–present)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/War_in_Afghanistan_(2001%E2%80%93present))
    *   A [Taliban](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Taliban) suicide bomber kills three [Czech](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Czech_Republic) soldiers on a routine patrol in [Charikar](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charikar), [Afghanistan](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Afghanistan). A [U.S.](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/United_States) soldier and two Afghan troops are also injured in the bombing. [(BBC)](https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-asia-45074383)
*   [Syrian Civil War](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Syrian_Civil_War)
    *   [Syrian media](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Media_of_Syria) reports that [ISIL](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Islamic_State_of_Iraq_and_the_Levant) has executed one of a number of [Druze](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Druze_people_in_Syria) hostages taken from [Syria](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Syria)'s government-held city of [As-Suwayda](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/As-Suwayda) in an attack [last week](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2018_As-Suwayda_attacks). [(_Haaretz_)](https://www.haaretz.com/middle-east-news/syria/isis-executes-hostage-in-syria-1.6342217)

## Disasters and accidents

*   [August 2018 Lombok earthquake](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/August_2018_Lombok_earthquake)
    *   A 7.0 magnitude [earthquake](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Earthquake) strikes [Lombok](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lombok), [Indonesia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Indonesia). A tsunami warning is issued. At least 98 people are killed and more than 200 are injured. [(_BBC_)](https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-asia-45081508)
*   [2018 Ju-Air Junkers Ju 52 crash](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2018_Ju-Air_Junkers_Ju_52_crash)
    *   Police in [Switzerland](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Switzerland) say that all 20 occupants of a [World War II](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_War_II)-era [Junkers Ju 52](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Junkers_Ju_52) plane that crashed yesterday on the flanks of the [Piz Segnas](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Piz_Segnas) mountain are dead. [(_Whig_)](http://www.whig.com/article/20180805/AP/308059949#)
*   [Police](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/New_Mexico_State_Police) in [New Mexico](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/New_Mexico) rescue 11 malnourished children being kept in squalid conditions in a remote desert compound. [(BBC)](https://www.bbc.com/news/world-us-canada-45079090)
*   Five people are killed after a small plane crashes in a [Southern California](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Southern_California) parking lot. [(_Time_)](http://time.com/5358271/plane-crash-southern-california/)

## International relations

*   [Canada–Saudi Arabia relations](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Canada%E2%80%93Saudi_Arabia_relations)
    *   [Saudi Arabia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Saudi_Arabia) withdraws its Ambassador from [Canada](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Canada), and orders the Canadian counterpart to leave the country in 24 hours, after Canada calls for the release of activists who are in detention in the Middle East nation. [(CBC News)](http://www.cbc.ca/news/politics/saudi-arabia-suspends-trade-canada-ambassador-1.4775133)

## Law and crime

*   [2018 Caracas bombing](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2018_Caracas_bombing)
    *   [Venezuelan](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Venezuelans) authorities detain six people involved in what they call an assassination attempt on [Venezuela President](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/President_of_Venezuela) [Nicolás Maduro](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nicol%C3%A1s_Maduro). [(_The Hill_)](http://thehill.com/policy/international/400482-6-arrested-in-connection-to-alleged-assassination-attempt-on-venezuelas)

## Sports

*   Englishwoman [Georgia Hall](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Georgia_Hall) wins the [2018 Women's British Open](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2018_Women%27s_British_Open) golf championship. [(_The Guardian_)](https://www.theguardian.com/sport/2018/aug/05/golf-georgia-hall-wins-womens-british-open-first-major)

# 2018-08-06

## Disasters and accidents

*   Landslides triggered by floods in [Nepal](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nepal) kill nine people. [(_The Himalayan_)](https://thehimalayantimes.com/news-archives/latest/landslide-claims-nine-lives-in-jajarkot-village/)
*   [2018 European heat wave](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2018_European_heat_wave)
    *   A heat wave in [Spain](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Spain) kills nine people. [(_Público_)](https://www.publico.es/sociedad/seis-fallecidos-ola-calor-espana.html)
    *   A heat wave in [Genoa](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Genoa), [Italy](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Italy), kills seven people. [(_Genova24_)](https://www.genova24.it/2018/08/allarme-caldo-sette-morti-sospette-in-48-ore-202931/)
*   A fuel tanker explodes on the [A14 motorway](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Autostrada_A14_(Italy)) after colliding with a lorry near [Bologna Airport](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bologna_Airport) in [Italy](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Italy), causing a section of the motorway to collapse. A person dies and 145 others are injured, at least 14 seriously. [(_Ansa_)](http://www.ansa.it/english/news/general_news/2018/08/07/145-injured-in-bologna-blaze-four-badly_5a9a9aff-813e-4ae2-992a-ffee2997f620.html)
*   Twelve migrant workers die and three others are injured when a truck collides with a van in [Foggia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Foggia), [Italy](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Italy). [(_Ansa_)](http://www.ansa.it/english/news/general_news/2018/08/06/12-killed-in-puglia-road-accident_6c4e89a0-ba7d-4561-b13c-577e18302a02.html)
*   The [Mendocino Complex Fire](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mendocino_Complex_Fire) grows into the largest active wildfire in California history. [(BBC)](https://www.bbc.com/news/world-us-canada-45093636)

## International relations

*   [Iran–United States relations](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Iran%E2%80%93United_States_relations), [Joint Comprehensive Plan of Action](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Joint_Comprehensive_Plan_of_Action)
    *   The [United States](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/United_States) reimposes sanctions on [Iran](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Iran) after [the US pulled out of the international agreement](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/United_States_withdrawal_from_the_Joint_Comprehensive_Plan_of_Action) three months prior. [(Reuters)](https://www.reuters.com/article/us-iran-nuclear/u-s-revives-sanctions-to-further-damage-irans-economy-idUSKBN1KR1N3)
    *   The [European Union](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/European_Union) announces that its [blocking statute](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Blocking_statute) against the US sanctions will take effect on August 7, protecting European companies from US sanctions and encouraging them to keep trading with Iran. [(_The Telegraph_)](https://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/2018/08/06/america-dismisses-eu-blocking-statute-iran-sanctions-finally/)
*   [Foreign relations of Brazil](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Foreign_relations_of_Brazil), [Crisis in Venezuela (2012–present)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Crisis_in_Venezuela_(2012%E2%80%93present))
    *   [Brazil](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brazil) closes [its international border](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brazil%E2%80%93Venezuela_border) with [Venezuela](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Venezuela), following a similar move enacted but then rescinded by [Colombia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Colombia) earlier in 2018, as a response to an increase in Venezuelans fleeing their country to neighbouring states. [(the Guardian)](https://www.theguardian.com/world/2018/aug/06/brazil-shuts-border-venezuelan-migrants)

## Politics and elections

*   [Caracas drone explosions](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Caracas_drone_explosions)
    *   [Venezuelan President](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/President_of_Venezuela) [Nicolás Maduro](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nicol%C3%A1s_Maduro) skips a rally in [Caracas](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Caracas) following weekend drone blasts that he called an assassination attempt, surprising and confusing some supporters in attendance. [(Reuters)](https://www.reuters.com/article/us-venezuela-politics/venezuelas-maduro-rallies-supporters-after-drone-blasts-idUSKBN1KR1SM)
    *   The [Colombian Civil Aviation Authority](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Colombian_Civil_Aviation_Authority) announces a ban on drones within a 2 nautical mile radius and altitude of Plaza Bolívar, [Bogotá](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bogot%C3%A1) during the Presidential Inauguration of [Iván Duque](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Iv%C3%A1n_Duque) the following afternoon. [(Tele13)](http://www.t13.cl/noticia/mundo/prohiben-drones-acto-posesion-duque-colombia)
*   [Second Ivorian Civil War](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Second_Ivorian_Civil_War)
    *   The government of [Ivory Coast](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ivory_Coast) grants amnesty to former First Lady [Simone Gbagbo](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Simone_Gbagbo) a week after the [Supreme Court of Ivory Coast](/w/index.php?title=Supreme_Court_of_Ivory_Coast&action=edit&redlink=1) ([fr](https://fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cour_supr%C3%AAme_(C%C3%B4te_d%27Ivoire))) overturned her acquittal for [crimes against humanity](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Crimes_against_humanity). [(France 24)](https://www.france24.com/en/20180806-ivory-coast-announces-amnesty-former-first-lady-simone-gbagbo)

## Science and technology

*   [Facebook](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Facebook) removes several _[InfoWars](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/InfoWars)_-related pages from its platform, for what it describes as glorification of violence and dehumanizing language. [YouTube](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/YouTube) deletes [Alex Jones](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alex_Jones)' main account for repeated Terms of Service violations. [Apple](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Apple_Inc.) and [Spotify](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Spotify) pull Jones' podcasts. Editor [Paul Joseph Watson](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paul_Joseph_Watson) calls Facebook's move "political censorship" on [Twitter](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Twitter). [(NBC News)](https://www.nbcnews.com/news/amp/ncna897861)

## Sport

*   [Swimming at the 2018 European Aquatics Championships – Mixed 4 × 100 metre medley relay](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Swimming_at_the_2018_European_Aquatics_Championships_%E2%80%93_Mixed_4_%C3%97_100_metre_medley_relay)
    *   The [British](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Team_GB) [4x100 mixed medley relay](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_record_progression_4_%C3%97_100_metres_medley_relay#Mixed) team (_[Anderson](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Freya_Anderson)_, _[Davies](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Georgia_Davies)_, _[Guy](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/James_Guy_(swimmer))_, _[Peaty](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Adam_Peaty)_) break their own [European record](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/European_record) at the [2018 European Games](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2018_European_Aquatics_Championships) in [Glasgow](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Glasgow), [Scotland](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Scotland).

# 2018-08-12

## Disasters and accidents

*   [August 2018 Lombok earthquake](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/August_2018_Lombok_earthquake)
    *   The BNPB spokesperson Sutopo Purwo Nugroho confirmed that the death toll from the earthquake in [Lombok](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lombok) rises to 392. [(_Tempo.co_)](https://en.tempo.co/read/news/2018/08/13/055920764/Lombok-Quake-Death-Toll-Reaches-392-Lives)
*   A report by the [SOHR](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Syrian_Observatory_for_Human_Rights) says that the explosion of an arms depot in [Sarmada](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sarmada), [Idlib Governorate](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Idlib_Governorate), [Syria](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Syria), kills at least 69 people, including 17 children. The cause of the blast is "not yet clear". Most of the victims were reportedly family members of [Hayat Tahrir al-Sham](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hayat_Tahrir_al-Sham) militants. [(_Reuters_)](https://www.reuters.com/article/us-mideast-crisis-syria-toll/death-toll-in-syria-blast-climbs-to-69-observatory-idUSKBN1KY0VT)
*   At least 15 people died after a bus fell into a ravine in the western region of [Ancash](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ancash), in [Peru](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Peru). [(_Xinhua_)](http://www.xinhuanet.com/english/2018-08/13/c_137385758.htm)

## International relations

*   [Convention on the legal status of the Caspian Sea](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Convention_on_the_legal_status_of_the_Caspian_Sea)
    *   After more than 20 years of negotiations, the five countries bordering the [Caspian Sea](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Caspian_Sea) sign an agreement in [Aktau](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Aktau), [Kazakhstan](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kazakhstan), on its shared use and the distribution of its resources. The convention legally defines the body of water as a [sea](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sea) rather than a [lake](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lake), but with special provisions. [(Deutsche Welle)](https://www.dw.com/en/russia-iran-and-other-states-agree-on-caspian-sea-access/a-45051799)
*   [Foreign relations of the Democratic Republic of the Congo](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Foreign_relations_of_the_Democratic_Republic_of_the_Congo), [Foreign relations of South Africa](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Foreign_relations_of_South_Africa)
    *   [South African President](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/President_of_South_Africa) [Cyril Ramaphosa](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cyril_Ramaphosa) meets with [President](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/President_of_the_Democratic_Republic_of_the_Congo) [Joseph Kabila](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Joseph_Kabila) of [DR Congo](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Democratic_Republic_of_the_Congo) in [Kinshasa](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kinshasa), praising him for his "respect for the [constitution](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Constitution_of_the_Democratic_Republic_of_the_Congo)" by agreeing to step down and not take part in the upcoming [December 2018 Congolese general election](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Democratic_Republic_of_the_Congo_general_election,_2018). [(_The South African_)](https://www.thesouthafrican.com/ramaphosa-praises-kabilas-respect-for-dr-congo-constitution/)

## Law and crime

*   [Moss Side mass shooting](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Moss_Side_mass_shooting)
    *   Ten people are injured in a [mass shooting](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mass_shooting) in [Manchester](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Manchester), [United Kingdom](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/United_Kingdom). [(BBC)](https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-45160462)

## Politics and elections

*   [Unite the Right 2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Unite_the_Right_2)
    *   Around twenty white nationalists hold a protest march in [Washington D.C.](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Washington_D.C.) on the first anniversary of the [Unite the Right rally](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Unite_the_Right_rally), with thousands of counter-protesters. [(AP via CBC News)](https://www.cbc.ca/news/world/charlottesville-year-later-washington-1.4782450)

## Science and technology

*   [NASA](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/NASA) launches the [Parker Solar Probe](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Parker_Solar_Probe), an [unpiloted spacecraft](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Unmanned_spacecraft) designed to study the [sun](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sun). [(BBC)](https://www.bbc.com/news/science-environment-45160722)

# 2018-08-13

## Armed conflicts and attacks

*   [War in Afghanistan](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/War_in_Afghanistan_(2001%E2%80%93present))
    *   More than 100 [Afghan soldiers](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Afghan_National_Army) and police, 13 civilians and hundreds of [Taliban](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Taliban) are killed during the [ongoing offensive in Ghazni](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ghazni_offensive). [(BBC)](https://www.bbc.com/news/world-asia-45168890)
    *   The [Taliban](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Taliban) captures Camp Chenaya, an [Afghan Army](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Afghan_Army) base in [Ghormach District](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ghormach_District), [Faryab Province](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Faryab_Province). # 2018-08-15

## Armed conflicts and attacks

*   [War in Afghanistan](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/War_in_Afghanistan_(2001%E2%80%93present))
    *   At least 48 people, mostly students, are killed and a further 67 are injured in a suicide bomb attack at an education centre in [Kabul](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kabul). The [Taliban](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Taliban) denies any involvement. [(BBC)](https://www.bbc.com/news/world-asia-45199904)
    *   The [Taliban](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Taliban) attacks two units of Afghan security forces in the [Baghlan-e-Markazi](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Baghlani_Jadid_District) district of [Baghlan Province](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Baghlan_Province), killing at least 39 soldiers and police officers. [(_SFGate_)](https://www.sfgate.com/world/article/At-least-87-killed-in-latest-violence-in-13158923.php)

## Business and economy

*   [Automotive industry in South Korea](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Automotive_industry_in_South_Korea)
    *   The government of [South Korea](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/South_Korea) announces that it will ban 20,000 [BMW](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/BMW) vehicles following engine fires. [(BBC)](https://www.bbc.com/news/business-45191874)
*   [Economy of New Zealand](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Economy_of_New_Zealand)
    *   [New Zealand](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/New_Zealand)'s [parliament](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/New_Zealand_Parliament) votes to ban the sale of homes to non-resident foreign nationals amid a housing affordability crisis. [Australians](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Australia) and [Singaporeans](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Singapore) are exempt due to free-trade deals. [(BBC)](https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-asia-45199034)

## Disasters and accidents

*   [2018 California wildfires](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2018_California_wildfires)
    *   Officials lift all mandatory evacuation orders for the deadly [Carr fire](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Carr_fire) in [Northern California](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Northern_California) that destroyed nearly 1,100 homes and killed eight people. [(KHQ)](http://www.khq.com/story/38894087/all-mandatory-evacuations-lifted-for-carr-fire-in-california) [(ABC News)](https://abcnews.go.com/Technology/wireStory/latest-evacuations-lifted-california-blaze-57205654)
*   22 children and a woman drown after their boat sinks in the [Nile](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nile) in [Sudan](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sudan) while travelling to school. [(_Business Standard_)](https://wap.business-standard.com/article/pti-stories/22-children-dead-in-nile-boat-accident-sudan-media-118081501158_1.htm)

## International relations

    *   [South Korean President](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/President_of_South_Korea) [Moon Jae-in](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Moon_Jae-in) announces plans to create a [Northeast Asian](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Northeast_Asia) railroad community with [North Korea](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/North_Korea), the [United States](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/United_States), [China](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/China), [Japan](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Japan), [Russia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Russia), and [Mongolia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mongolia). [(CNBC)](https://www.cnbc.com/2018/08/15/south-korea-proposes-asian-railway-community-with-pyongyang.html)

## Law and crime

*   [Caracas drone explosions](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Caracas_drone_explosions)

## Arts and culture

    *   The [United States Department of Defense](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/United_States_Department_of_Defense) postpones [President](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/President_of_the_United_States) [Donald Trump](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Donald_Trump)'s military parade, which was slated to take place on 10 November, until 2019. The estimates for the parade's cost have risen from $12 million to $92 million. *   [Freedom of the press in the United States](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Freedom_of_the_press_in_the_United_States)
    *   In coordinated [editorials](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Editorial) defending [press freedom](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Freedom_of_the_press), hundreds of [U.S. newspapers](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_newspapers_in_the_United_States) rebuke [President](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/President_of_the_United_States) [Donald Trump](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Donald_Trump)'s repeated accusations that the news media reports "[fake news](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fake_news)" and that journalists are "[enemies of the people](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Enemy_of_the_people)". *   [Me Too movement](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Me_Too_movement) in [China](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/China)
    *   Following several accusations of sexual misconduct, [Shi Xuecheng](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Xuecheng_(monk)) resigns from the office of president of the [Buddhist Association of China](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Buddhist_Association_of_China). [(The Guardian)](https://theguardian.com/world/2018/aug/15/senior-chinese-monk-shi-xuecheng-resigns-sexual-misconduct-claims)

## Disasters and accidents

*   [2018 California wildfires](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2018_California_wildfires)
    *   A rare [fire tornado](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fire_whirl) that barreled into the city of [Redding](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Redding,_California) during the [Carr Fire](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Carr_Fire) kills a firefighter as he raced towards a neighborhood in flames. [(Los Angeles Times)](http://www.latimes.com/local/lanow/la-me-ln-fire-tornado-redding-20180816-story.html?outputType=amp)
*   [2018 Kerala floods](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2018_Kerala_floods)

## Law and crime

    *   The Mexican government announces that they are offering up to MXN$30 million (equivalent to US$1.56 million) for anyone who provides information that leads to the arrest of [Nemesio Oseguera Cervantes](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nemesio_Oseguera_Cervantes) (alias "El Mencho"), the suspected leader of the [Jalisco New Generation Cartel](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jalisco_New_Generation_Cartel) and one of Mexico's most-wanted. # 2018-09-29

## Disasters and accidents

*   [2018 Sulawesi earthquake and tsunami](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2018_Sulawesi_earthquake_and_tsunami)
    *   More than 408 people are confirmed dead and at least 540 injured after a [tsunami](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tsunami) triggered by a magnitude 7.5 earthquake which hit [Palu](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Palu) and [Donggala](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Donggala), [Indonesia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Indonesia), on Friday. [(BBC)](https://www.bbc.com/news/world-asia-45696132)
*   A [Mediterranean tropical-like cyclone](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mediterranean_tropical-like_cyclone) (also known as a "Medicane") strikes [Greece](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Greece) near [Kalamata](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kalamata), causing power outages and gale force winds near the capital [Athens](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Athens). In the storm's formative stages, heavy rains killed four people in [Tunisia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tunisia). [(Weather Underground)](https://www.wunderground.com/cat6/Tropical-Storm-Medicane-Hits-Greece), [(_The Weather Channel_)](https://weather.com/news/weather/news/2018-09-28-mediterranean-medicane-hurricane-greece-turkey)
*   The [United States Coast Guard](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/United_States_Coast_Guard) rescues one survivor after a helicopter crashes near [Yakutat, Alaska](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yakutat,_Alaska). Three others aboard the helicopter are missing. [(KTUU-TV)](https://www.ktuu.com/content/news/Coast-guard-rescues-1-survivor-from-helicopter-crash-searching-for-3-more-494703011.html)

## Law and crime

    *   Under the terms of a settlement with the [U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/U.S._Securities_and_Exchange_Commission), [Elon Musk](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Elon_Musk) and [Tesla, Inc.](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tesla,_Inc.) agree to pay $20 million each to financial regulators, and Musk is expected to resign as chairman, but will remain as chief executive. [(_Market Watch_)](https://www.marketwatch.com/story/elon-musk-settlement-with-sec-costs-him-tesla-chairmanship-and-20-million-fine-2018-09-29) [(_HuffPost_)](https://www.huffingtonpost.com/entry/elon-musk-resigning-as-tesla-chairman_us_5baff33ae4b0343b3dc0b452)

    *   Police clash with [separatists](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Separatism) in [Barcelona](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Barcelona) marking the aniversary of the [2017 independence referendum](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Catalan_independence_referendum,_2017). *   Ernest Fenwick MacIntosh, a 75-year old [Nova Scotia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nova_Scotia) man convicted of sexually abusing an underage boy in March [2015](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2015), is released from prison and ordered out of [Nepal](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nepal) after serving half of his seven-year sentence. [(CTV News)](https://www.ctvnews.ca/mobile/canada/canadian-convicted-of-abusing-underage-boy-released-from-nepal-prison-1.4114988)

Allison](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/James_P._Allison) and [Tasuku Honjo](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tasuku_Honjo) for their discoveries in cancer therapy. # 2018-10-06

## Armed conflicts and attacks

*   [Israeli–Palestinian conflict](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Israeli%E2%80%93Palestinian_conflict)
    *   [Defense Minister of Israel](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ministry_of_Defense_(Israel)) [Avigdor Lieberman](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Avigdor_Lieberman) says that Israel will reduce the fishing zone off the [Gaza Strip](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gaza_Strip) from 9 nautical miles (17 km; 10 mi) to 6 nautical miles (11 km; 6.9 mi) as a reaction to the weekly [Gaza border protests](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2018_Gaza_border_protests). Three Palestinians were killed in yesterday's protest, in which over 20,000 protestors took part. [(Al Jazeera)](https://www.aljazeera.com/news/2018/10/israel-reduce-gaza-fishing-zone-181006152457024.html)

## Arts and culture

*   At an auction in [London](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/London), the painting _[Girl with Balloon](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Balloon_Girl)_ by [Banksy](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Banksy) [self-destructs](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Self-destruct) through a built-in [shredder](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paper_shredder) hidden in the frame after selling for US$1.4 million. [(NBC)](https://www.cbsnews.com/news/banksy-artwork-girl-with-ballooon-self-destructs-moment-after-1-4-million-sale-at-sothebys-london-2018-10-06/)

## Disasters and accidents

*   [2018 Sulawesi earthquake and tsunami](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2018_Sulawesi_earthquake_and_tsunami)
    *   The death toll of the [earthquake](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Earthquake) and [tsunami](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tsunami) that struck [Sulawesi](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sulawesi), [Indonesia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Indonesia), rises to 1,649. More than 265 are missing. [(_The New York Times_)](https://www.nytimes.com/aponline/2018/10/06/world/asia/ap-as-indonesia-earthquake-the-latest.html)
*   At least 50 people are killed and 100 others are injured after an oil [tank truck](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tank_truck) collides with a vehicle on the [Kinshasa](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kinshasa)—[Matadi](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Matadi) highway in [Kisantu](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kisantu), [Democratic Republic of Congo](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Democratic_Republic_of_Congo). [(NDTV)](https://www.ndtv.com/world-news/50-killed-100-burnt-in-oil-tanker-road-crash-in-dr-congo-says-official-1927923)
*   At least 22 people are killed and 14 injured after a minibus falls into a [gorge](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gorge) on the [Srinagar Jammu National Highway](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Srinagar_Jammu_National_Highway) in [India](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/India)'s [Jammu and Kashmir](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jammu_and_Kashmir) state. [(_Tribune of India_)](https://www.tribuneindia.com/news/jammu-kashmir/22-dead-as-mini-bus-falls-into-gorge-on-jammu-srinagar-national-highway/664136.html)
*   [2018 Haiti earthquake](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2018_Haiti_earthquake)
    *   A magnitude 5.9 earthquake kills at least 11 people in northern [Haiti](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Haiti). [(Rappler)](https://www.rappler.com/world/regions/latin-america/213718-death-toll-haiti-earthquake-october-2018)
*   [2018 Schoharie New York traffic accident](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2018_Schoharie_New_York_traffic_accident)
    *   Twenty people have been killed when a limousine and another vehicle crashed and plough into a crowd of pedestrians at a store near a busy intersection in [Schoharie County](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Schoharie_County), [United States](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/United_States). All 18 people in the limousine died along with two pedestrians. [(BBC)](https://www.bbc.com/news/world-us-canada-45778366)

## Law and crime

*   [Food Additives Amendment of 1958](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Food_Additives_Amendment_of_1958)
    *   The U.S. [Food and Drug Administration](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Food_and_Drug_Administration) bans the usage of seven [artificial flavors](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Artificial_flavor) as [food additives](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Food_additive). Six of them cause cancer in animals when used in "much higher" doses than the conditions of their intended use. [(NPR)](https://www.npr.org/sections/thesalt/2018/10/06/655135633/fda-bans-use-of-7-synthetic-food-additives-after-environmental-groups-sue?t=1538864933173)

## Politics and elections

*   [Gabonese legislative election, 2018](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gabonese_legislative_election,_2018)
    *   After long delays, voters in [Gabon](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gabon) head to the polls for the first time since the controversial [2016 presidential election](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gabonese_presidential_election,_2016). [(EWN)](https://ewn.co.za/2018/10/04/gabon-holds-first-vote-since-violence-marred-2016-election)
*   [Latvian parliamentary election, 2018](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Latvian_parliamentary_election,_2018)
    *   Voters in [Latvia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Latvia) go to the polls to vote for a new [parliament](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Saeima). The governing coalition loses its majority with two new parties [Who owns the state?](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Who_owns_the_state%3F) and the [New Conservative Party](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/New_Conservative_Party_(Latvia)) becoming the second and third biggest parties behind the pro-[Russian](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Russia) [Social Democratic Party "Harmony"](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Social_Democratic_Party_%22Harmony%22) party. [(_Deutsche Welle_)](https://www.dw.com/en/pro-russia-party-looms-large-at-latvia-elections/a-45778243), [(Reuters)](https://www.reuters.com/article/us-latvia-election/newcomers-winners-in-latvian-election-tough-coalition-talks-ahead-idUSKCN1MG0EI?feedType=RSS&feedName=worldNews)
*   [Brett Kavanaugh Supreme Court nomination](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brett_Kavanaugh_Supreme_Court_nomination)
    *   Judge [Brett Kavanaugh](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brett_Kavanaugh)'s nomination to the [U.S. Supreme Court](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Supreme_Court_of_the_United_States) is confirmed when a final vote takes place, with 50 senators for his confirmation and 48 against. [(ABC News)](https://abcnews.go.com/Politics/kavanaugh-latest-confirmation-ahead-senate-vote-saturday/story?id=58316458)
*   [Romanian constitutional referendum, 2018](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Romanian_constitutional_referendum,_2018)
    *   [Romanians](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Romania) go to the polls to vote in a referendum on changing the [Constitution](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Constitution_of_Romania) to redefine marriage as being only between a man and a woman. [(CNN)](https://edition.cnn.com/2018/10/06/europe/romania-marriage-referendum-intl/index.html)

# 2018-10-07

## Armed conflicts and attacks

*   [War in Afghanistan](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/War_in_Afghanistan_(2001%E2%80%93present))
    *   Afghan officials say that the [Taliban](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Taliban) destroyed highway bridges in [Maidan Wardak Province](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maidan_Wardak_Province), cutting off road traffic between the capital [Kabul](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kabul) and the provinces of [Ghazni](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ghazni_Province), [Zabul](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Zabul_Province) and [Kandahar](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kandahar_Province). Electricity was cut off in four provinces, and fighting was reported in Ghazni Province. At least ten Afghan police officers were killed. [Parliamentary elections](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Afghan_parliamentary_election,_2018) are scheduled to be held in two weeks. [(AP via _Tampa Times_)](http://www.tampabay.com/ap/world/taliban-destroy-highway-bridges-cut-off--afghan-provinces-ap_worldabefcf4fe2c64e97bd22010bb6119c1d) [(Reuters via _The National_)](https://www.thenational.ae/world/asia/afghan-taliban-launch-deadly-attacks-in-wardak-and-ghazni-1.778012)
*   [2018 Barkan Industrial Park shooting](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2018_Barkan_Industrial_Park_shooting)
    *   A 23-year-old Palestinian opens fire and kills two Israelis, seriously wounding a third inside the [Barkan Industrial Park](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Barkan_Industrial_Park) on the [West Bank](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/West_Bank). The gunman, who had worked at the factory where the shooting took place, fled the scene and remains at large. [(_The Washington Post_)](https://www.washingtonpost.com/world/middle_east/israeli-military-west-bank-shooting-attack-wounds-3/2018/10/07/706ad5a6-c9f4-11e8-9c0f-2ffaf6d422aa_story.html) [(Reuters)](https://uk.reuters.com/article/uk-israel-palestinians-shooting/palestinian-gunman-kills-two-israelis-in-west-bank-israeli-military-idUKKCN1MH05T) [(Ynet News)](https://www.ynetnews.com/articles/0,7340,L-5365228,00.html)

## Disasters and accidents

*   [2018 Sulawesi earthquake and tsunami](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2018_Sulawesi_earthquake_and_tsunami)
    *   The [Indonesia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Indonesia)'s disaster agency confirms the deaths of 1,944 people in the double earthquake and tsunami. 5,000 people are still missing and presumed dead. [(ABS-CBN News)](https://news.abs-cbn.com/overseas/10/08/18/more-bodies-found-as-death-toll-from-indonesia-quake-nears-2000)
*   Six people in [Honduras](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Honduras), three in [Nicaragua](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nicaragua), two in [El Salvador](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/El_Salvador), and one in [Costa Rica](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Costa_Rica) died after heavy floods affected [Central America](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Central_America). Several others are injured and at least one is missing. [(Channel NewsAsia)](https://www.channelnewsasia.com/news/world/heavy-rains-across-central-america-leave-12-dead-10802034)

## Law and crime

*   Police announce that investigative journalist [Viktoria Marinova](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Viktoria_Marinova) was found murdered yesterday in a park in [Ruse, Bulgaria](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ruse,_Bulgaria). Marinova's latest work was on "GPgate", a scandal involving alleged corruption and abuse of [European Union](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/European_Union) subsidies in Bulgaria. [(_Thuner Tagblatt_)](https://www.thunertagblatt.ch/ausland/europa/bulgarische-journalistin-nach-bericht-ueber-korruption-ermordet/story/26303428) [(RFE/RL)](https://www.rferl.org/a/bulgarian-authorities-investigating-killing-of-investigative-tv-reporter/29530383.html)
*   The [Communist Party of China](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Communist_Party_of_China) announces that [Interpol](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Interpol) president [Meng Hongwei](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Meng_Hongwei) is suspected of violating the law and is "under the supervision" of a party anticorruption watchdog. Hours later, Interpol announces that it has received his resignation. [(_The New York Times_)](https://www.nytimes.com/2018/10/07/world/asia/china-interpol-men-hongwei.html) [(Twitter)](https://twitter.com/INTERPOL_HQ/status/1049003122046259201/photo/1)
*   [2018 attacks on Hindi-speaking migrants in Gujarat](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2018_attacks_on_Hindi-speaking_migrants_in_Gujarat)
    *   There were incidents of attacks on Hindi-speaking migrants in Indian state of [Gujarat](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gujarat) after the alleged rape of a 14-month-old in north Gujarat a week ago. [(First Post)](https://www.firstpost.com/india/gujarat-police-arrests-342-for-attacking-migrants-from-up-bihar-two-cases-lodged-for-spreading-social-media-rumours-5336001.html)

## Politics and elections

*   [Cameroonian presidential election, 2018](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cameroonian_presidential_election,_2018)
    *   Voters in [Cameroon](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cameroon) head to the polls. Incumbent [President](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/President_of_Cameroon) [Paul Biya](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paul_Biya) seeks a seventh term to his 36-year rule. [(Reuters)](https://www.reuters.com/article/us-cameroon-election/cameroon-goes-to-the-polls-as-biya-seeks-to-extend-36-year-rule-idUSKCN1MH00D)
*   [Brazilian general election, 2018](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brazilian_general_election,_2018)
    *   Brazilians elect a new [president](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/President_of_Brazil) (first round), [state governors](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_current_state_governors_in_Brazil) and parliaments. [(RTÉ)](https://www.rte.ie/news/world/2018/1007/1001461-brazilians-go-to-the-polls-to-elect-a-new-president/) [(Al Jazeera)](https://www.aljazeera.com/news/2018/10/brazil-bolsonaro-pulls-eve-presidential-election-181006163216965.html)
    *   Far-right candidate [Jair Bolsonaro](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jair_Bolsonaro) falls short of a majority in the first round with 46% of the vote and will face [Fernando Haddad](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fernando_Haddad), who received 29%, in a [runoff vote](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Two-round_system) set for October 28. [(The Guardian)](https://www.theguardian.com/world/live/2018/oct/08/brazil-election-2018-polls-close-after-chaotic-and-unpredictable-campaign-live)
*   [Romanian constitutional referendum, 2018](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Romanian_constitutional_referendum,_2018)
    *   A referendum on changing the constitutional definition of a family is invalidated, as [voter turnout](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Voter_turnout) announced by the Central Electoral Bureau is 20.41%, 10% under the validation threshold. [(Digi 24)](https://www.digi24.ro/referendum-familie-2018/referendum-schimbare-constitutie-redefinire-casatorie-familie-1008821)

# 2018-10-08

## Business and economy

*   [Google](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Google) announces that it is shutting down its [Google+](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Google%2B) network for consumers after seven years due to "very low usage" and a software error, first reported by _[The Wall Street Journal](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Wall_Street_Journal)_, that potentially exposed the data of 500,000 users. Google+ will fully shut down in August 2019. [(Sky News)](https://news.sky.com/story/plug-pulled-on-social-network-google-after-users-data-left-exposed-11521546)

## Disasters and accidents

*   [2018 Haiti earthquake](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2018_Haiti_earthquake)
    *   The death toll of a magnitude 5.9 earthquake that struck [Haiti](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Haiti) rises to 15. At least 333 others are injured. [(The Punch)](https://punchng.com/haiti-quake-death-toll-rises-to-15/)
*   [2018 Atlantic hurricane season](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2018_Atlantic_hurricane_season)
    *   A hurricane watch is issued for the [Florida Panhandle](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Florida_Panhandle) as [Hurricane Michael](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hurricane_Michael_(2018)) begins moving toward the [Yucatan Channel](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yucat%C3%A1n_Channel). [(Upi)](https://www.upi.com/Top_News/US/2018/10/08/Tropical-Storm-Michael-grows-to-near-hurricane-strength/9191538932122/)
    *   Tropical Storm Michael becomes [Hurricane Michael](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hurricane_Michael_(2018)) and is upgraded to a category 1 storm. [(NBC News)](https://www.nbcnews.com/news/us-news/tropical-storm-michael-upgraded-category-1-hurricane-n917766)

## Law and crime

*   [Poisoning of Sergei and Yulia Skripal](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Poisoning_of_Sergei_and_Yulia_Skripal)
    *   Investigative website [Bellingcat](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bellingcat) identifies the second suspect involved in the poisoning of Sergei and Yulia Skripal as Alexander Mishkin, a doctor who works for the [Main Intelligence Directorate](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Main_Intelligence_Directorate). [(_The Guardian_)](https://www.theguardian.com/uk-news/2018/oct/08/website-names-second-suspect-in-skripal-poisoning-case)

## Science and technology

*   [Moons of Jupiter](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Moons_of_Jupiter), [Colonization of Europa](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Colonization_of_Europa)
    *   New research suggests [Europa](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Europa_(moon)), a moon of [Jupiter](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jupiter), may be covered in tall, jagged ice spikes, presenting a problem for any potential landing on its surface. [(The Verge)](https://www.theverge.com/2018/10/8/17948510/jupiter-moon-europa-nasa-clipper-lander-penitentes) [(Washington Post)](https://www.washingtonpost.com/science/2018/10/08/jagged-ice-spikes-cover-jupiters-moon-europa-study-suggests/?utm_term=.d51e1ab37dba)

## Sports

*   [2018 NFL season](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2018_NFL_season)
    *   [New Orleans Saints](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/New_Orleans_Saints) quarterback [Drew Brees](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Drew_Brees) becomes the [NFL](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/National_Football_League)’s career leader in passing yardage, surpassing [Peyton Manning](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Peyton_Manning). [(Fox News)](https://www.foxnews.com/sports/drew-brees-sets-all-time-nfl-passing-yards-record-passing-peyton-manning) [(_The Washington Post_)](https://www.washingtonpost.com/sports/2018/10/09/drew-brees-breaks-peyton-mannings-nfl-record-passing-yards/?noredirect=on)
*   [2018 Major League Baseball season](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2018_Major_League_Baseball_season)
    *   [Boston Red Sox](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Boston_Red_Sox) player [Brock Holt](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brock_Holt) becomes the first player in [MLB](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Major_League_Baseball) history to [hit for the cycle](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hitting_for_the_cycle) during a [postseason](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Major_League_Baseball_postseason) game. [(ESPN)](http://www.espn.com/mlb/story/_/id/24935491/brock-holt-first-hit-cycle-mlb-postseason-red-sox-rout-yankees) [(Bleacher Report)](https://bleacherreport.com/articles/2799849-brock-holt-hits-1st-ever-postseason-cycle-in-red-soxs-blowout-win-vs-yankees)

# 2018-10-10

## Disasters and accidents

*   At least 51 people are killed when a bus traveling from the [Kenyan](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kenya) capital [Nairobi](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nairobi) to [Kisumu](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kisumu) veers off the road and overturns. [(BBC)](https://www.bbc.com/news/world-africa-45807969)
*   At least 12 people die in [flash flooding](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flash_flood) on the [Spanish](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Spain) island of [Majorca](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mallorca). A child is missing. [(BBC)](https://www.bbc.com/news/world-europe-45821680)
*   Three people were killed and houses were damaged after a magnitude 6.3 earthquake struck off [East Java](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/East_Java), [Indonesia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Indonesia). [(The Straits Time)](https://www.straitstimes.com/asia/se-asia/shallow-60-magnitude-quake-hits-off-indonesias-java-usgs)
*   At least five people died and 30 were injured when a passenger train derailed in the north [Indian](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/India) state of [Uttar Pradesh](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Uttar_Pradesh). [(Cyprus Mail)](https://cyprus-mail.com/2018/10/10/bus-crash-kills-42-in-kenya-train-accident-kills-5-in-india/)
*   Four people are killed and 20 others are injured when an apartment building collapses in [Manama](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Manama), [Bahrain](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bahrain). [(Gulf Business)](http://gulfbusiness.com/least-four-killed-building-collapses-bahrain/)
*   [2018 Haiti earthquake](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2018_Haiti_earthquake)
    *   The death toll of a magnitude 5.9 earthquake that struck [Haiti](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Haiti) rises to 17. [(Otago Daily Times)](https://www.odt.co.nz/news/world/17-killed-haiti-quake)
*   [2018 Atlantic hurricane season](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2018_Atlantic_hurricane_season)
    *   [Hurricane Michael](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hurricane_Michael) strengthens to a "potentially catastrophic" [Category 4](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_Category_4_Atlantic_hurricanes) hurricane and makes landfall on the [Florida Panhandle](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Florida_Panhandle). [(NPR)](https://www.npr.org/2018/10/10/656052881/hurricane-michael-an-extremely-dangerous-category-4-storm-heads-toward-florida) [(Fortune)](http://fortune.com/2018/10/10/hurricane-michael-florida-landfall/)
    *   A man in [Greensboro, Florida](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Greensboro,_Florida) is killed by a tree that crashed through his home, becoming the first reported death from the storm in the United States. Later, a child is killed by a falling tree in [Seminole County, Georgia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Seminole_County,_Georgia). [(BBC)](https://www.bbc.com/news/world-us-canada-45818960)
    *   The storm causes power outages to 550,000 customers in [Florida](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Florida), [Georgia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Georgia_(U.S._state)), and [Alabama](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alabama), and 375,000 people in 22 counties have been ordered to evacuate. [(The Weather Channel)](https://weather.com/storms/hurricane/news/2018-10-10-hurricane-michael-impacts-florida-gulf-coast)
    *   Heavy rain and strong winds from Michael are expected in [the Carolinas](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Carolinas), Georgia, and [Virginia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Virginia) on Thursday. [(Washington Post)](https://www.washingtonpost.com/weather/2018/10/10/hurricane-michael-could-become-strongest-record-strike-florida-panhandle-wednesday/?utm_term=.988544e06c34)

## International relations

*   The [Turkish newspaper](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Media_of_Turkey) _[Sabah](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sabah_(newspaper))_ names the 15-member [Saudi Arabian](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Saudi_Arabia) intelligence team allegedly involved in the disappearance of Saudi journalist [Jamal Khashoggi](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jamal_Khashoggi). [(Reuters)](https://www.reuters.com/article/us-saudi-politics-dissident-turkey/turkish-newspaper-names-15-saudis-in-khashoggi-case-idUSKCN1MK0J0?feedType=RSS&feedName=worldNews)

    *   A [Dhaka](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dhaka) court sentences 19 people to death, including two former ministers, and sentences [Bangladesh Nationalist Party](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bangladesh_Nationalist_Party) acting chairman [Tarique Rahman](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tarique_Rahman) to life imprisonment over a [2004 attack](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2004_Dhaka_grenade_attack) on [Prime Minister](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prime_Minister_of_Bangladesh) [Sheikh Hasina](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sheikh_Hasina). # 2018-10-11

## Disasters and accidents

*   At least 36 people are killed after a river bursts its bank in [Bududa](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bududa), [Uganda](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Uganda). Many more are injured and dozens are displaced. [(BBC)](https://www.bbc.com/news/world-africa-45836381)
*   [2018 European floods](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2018_European_floods)
    *   Heavy floods affect [France](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/France) and [Italy](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Italy): in the French city of [Sainte Maxime](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sainte_Maxime), two people drown after their vehicle is swept away by floodwater. In the Italian city of [Cagliari](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cagliari), a woman is found dead inside her car, while another man is missing. A bridge also collapses and roads are damaged. [(BBC)](https://www.bbc.com/news/world-europe-45821680)
*   [2018 Atlantic hurricane season](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2018_Atlantic_hurricane_season)
    *   [Hurricane Michael](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hurricane_Michael) is downgraded to a tropical storm, but tornadoes are spotted in [Georgia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Georgia_(U.S._state)) and [Florida](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Florida). [(Business Insider)](https://www.businessinsider.com/hurricane-michael-tornadoes-hit-georgia-florida-county-warnings-2018-10?r=UK&IR=T)
*   Eight children die and three are injured when the wall of a house collapses in [Sukkur](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sukkur)'s suburban area, [Pakistan](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pakistan). [(Dawn News)](https://www.dawn.com/news/1438356/8-children-die-as-wall-of-house-collapses-in-sukkur) [(Samaa TV)](https://www.samaa.tv/news/2018/10/eight-children-killed-after-wall-collapses-in-sukkur/)
*   A mudslide in the central [Colombian](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Colombia) town of [Marquetalia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marquetalia,_Caldas) results in at least twelve deaths. [(AP via ABC America)](https://abcnews.go.com/International/wireStory/mudslide-kills-12-people-central-colombia-58442099)
*   The collapse of a [shopping mall](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shopping_mall) under construction in the [Mexican](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mexico) city of [Monterrey](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Monterrey) results in at least seven deaths and nine people missing. 15 others are injured. [(AP via ABC News America)](https://abcnews.go.com/International/wireStory/dead-12-missing-collapse-northern-mexico-mall-58445725)
*   Three people died and two are injured after a minibus crashed with a lorry in [Thatcham](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thatcham), [England](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/England). [(BBC)](https://www.bbc.com/news/uk-england-45841847)

## International relations

*   The [Ecumenical Patriarchate of Constantinople](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ecumenical_Patriarchate_of_Constantinople) plans to recognize the [autocephaly](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Autocephaly) of the Ukrainian Orthodox Church, a move welcomed by Ukrainian leaders and denounced as "catastrophic" by the [Russian Orthodox Church](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Russian_Orthodox_Church). [(RFE/RL)](https://www.rferl.org/a/constantinople-patriarchate-agrees-to-recognize-independence-of-ukrainian-orthodox-church/29538590.html)

*   [Keiko Fujimori](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Keiko_Fujimori), leader of the opposition in the [Congress of Peru](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Congress_of_the_Republic_of_Peru) and daughter of former President [Alberto Fujimori](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alberto_Fujimori), is arrested on charges related to illicit campaign finance received from the [Odebrecht](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Odebrecht) corporation. *   [Soyuz MS-10](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Soyuz_MS-10), carrying a cosmonaut and an astronaut to the [International Space Station](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/International_Space_Station), is forced to make an emergency landing in [Kazakhstan](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kazakhstan) after a failure with its [Soyuz-FG](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Soyuz-FG) rocket. [(Phys.org)](https://phys.org/news/2018-10-boy-world-life-long-space-buff.html) [(CBC CA)](https://www.cbc.ca/news/canada/london/exoplanet-western-university-159d-1.4859678)

# 2018-10-13

## Disasters and accidents

*   Five South Korean climbers and four Nepali guides die after a snowstorm destroys their camp on a [Himalayan](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Himalaya) peak in [Nepal](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nepal). [(BBC)](https://www.bbc.com/news/world-asia-45848535)
*   At least 27 people have died and many others have gone missing after heavy floods and landslides in [Sumatra](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sumatra), [Indonesia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Indonesia). *   At least 50 people are killed and 30 others are injured when a pipeline catches fire and explodes in southeast [Nigeria](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nigeria). [(Ripples Nigeria)](https://www.ripplesnigeria.com/50-people-burnt-to-death-in-aba-pipeline-explosion-30-hospitalized/amp/)
*   Eleven people die after their vehicle and a lorry collide head-on in [Thessaloniki](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thessaloniki), [Greece](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Greece). [(BBC)](https://www.bbc.com/news/world-europe-45851377)

*   Acting on an anonymous tip, [Michigan state inspectors](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Michigan_Department_of_Licensing_and_Regulatory_Affairs) discover the bodies of 11 badly-decomposed infants inside the ceiling of a former funeral home in [Detroit](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Detroit). # 2018-10-15

## Armed attacks and conflicts

    *   At least three people are injured after a man [firebombs](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Firebombing) a fast-food restaurant in the [Cologne main station](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/K%C3%B6ln_Hauptbahnhof) and takes a woman hostage. The woman is later rescued by German counter-terrorism units. [(_The Guardian_)](https://www.theguardian.com/world/2018/oct/15/germany-police-hostage-cologne-railway-station) [(_Washington Post_)](https://www.washingtonpost.com/world/europe/cologne-police-hostage-incident-at-train-station/2018/10/15/0b936580-d070-11e8-a4db-184311d27129_story.html)

## Arts and culture

*   [Kensington Palace](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kensington_Palace) announces that Their Royal Highnesses [Harry, Duke of Sussex](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prince_Harry,_Duke_of_Sussex) and [Meghan, Duchess of Sussex](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Meghan,_Duchess_of_Sussex) are expecting their first child. [(BBC)](https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-45861683)

    *   American retailer [Sears](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sears) files for [Chapter 11 bankruptcy](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chapter_11,_Title_11,_United_States_Code) after accumulating [USD $](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/United_States_dollar)134 million in debt. [(ABC News)](https://abcnews.go.com/US/wireStory/sears-files-chapter-11-amid-plunging-sales-massive-58498980)
*   [Hydraulic fracturing in the United Kingdom](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hydraulic_fracturing_in_the_United_Kingdom)
    *   [Fracking](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hydraulic_fracturing) for [shale gas](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shale_gas_in_the_United_Kingdom) begins in the [United Kingdom](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/United_Kingdom) for the first time since it was suspended in [2011](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2011) after being linked to a series of earthquakes. [Cuadrilla Resources](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cuadrilla_Resources) say they will spend at least three months fracking two horizontal wells in [Lancashire](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lancashire). [(BBC)](https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-england-lancashire-45825268)

## Disasters and accidents

*   [2018 European floods](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2018_European_floods), [Hurricane Leslie (2018)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hurricane_Leslie_(2018))
    *   At least 10 people have been killed by flash floods in the [Aude](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Aude) region of south-western [France](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/France). A bridge also collapsed in the locality of [Villegailhenc](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Villegailhenc), while all roads are inaccessible in [Carcassonne](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Carcassonne). [(BBC)](https://www.bbc.com/news/world-europe-45861428)
*   [2018 California wildfires](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2018_California_wildfires)
    *   The [Pacific Gas and Electric Company](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pacific_Gas_and_Electric_Company), a major [California](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/California) utility based in [San Francisco](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/San_Francisco), announces they temporarily turned off power to 60,000 customers in 12 [Northern California](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Northern_California) [counties](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_counties_in_California) due to threats of wildfires. [Red flag warnings](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Red_flag_warning) are issued to 22 million people in the state. [(CNN)](https://www.cnn.com/2018/10/15/us/california-fire-season/index.html) [(Mercury News)](https://www.mercurynews.com/2018/10/14/pge-cuts-north-bay-towns-power-citing-fire-risk/)

## International relations

*   [Russia–Ukraine relations](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Russia%E2%80%93Ukraine_relations), [Eastern Orthodox Church](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eastern_Orthodox_Church)
    *   The [Russian Orthodox Church](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Russian_Orthodox_Church) announces it will break communion with the [Ecumenical Patriarchate of Constantinople](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ecumenical_Patriarchate_of_Constantinople) over EoC official plans to recognize the [autocephaly](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Autocephaly) of two [Ukrainian Orthodox](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ukrainian_Orthodox_Church_%E2%80%93_Kiev_Patriarchate) [Churches](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ukrainian_Autocephalous_Orthodox_Church). Moscow says it hopes Constantinople will change its mind to avoid this [schism](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Schism). This marks an important new aspect in the rift between Russia and Ukraine. [(_The Guardian_)](https://www.theguardian.com/world/2018/oct/15/russian-orthodox-church-cuts-ties-with-constantinople)

[(BBC)](https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/newsbeat-45860488)
*   [Mounir el-Motassadeq](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mounir_el-Motassadeq), sentenced to 15 years in prison as a member of the [Hamburg cell](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hamburg_cell) of the [September 11 attackers](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/September_11_attacks), was deported from [Hamburg](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hamburg), [Germany](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Germany) to [Morocco](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Morocco).
